Name: Travel with Vera II
Desc: When something is about to burn, better put out the fire fast.

Name: Travel with Vera III
Desc: The paint is your ammunition. Destroy all the opponents' works.

Name: Travel with Lee II
Desc: Before putting out the fire, perhaps you can find out how it started in the first place.

Name: Travel with Lee III
Desc: A war fought with paint, with obsessions that are impossible to be understood.

Name: Travel with Ayla II
Desc: A mysterious girl appears behind the burning flames.

Name: Travel with Ayla III
Desc: Try to touch and understand that human hands are not claws.

Name: Travel with Karenina II
Desc: Let the Engineering Force's music be heard on every street of Constellia.

Name: Travel with Karenina III
Desc: The first drink made for humans is placed on the table of the newly opened shop.

Name: Vera
Desc: I have no time to waste on those weird things. Just tell me where they are.

Name: Vera
Desc: Are you relating to the works, Commandant? How interesting.

Name: Vera
Desc: Still taking your time to handle the tasks, Commandant? Do you think we have a lot of time to waste?

Name: Vera
Desc: Is this all you are trying to gather? Why don't you just rob from those who have it?

Name: Vera
Desc: You got these toys here, so take them with you, Commandant. I'm never going to attach these junks to myself.

Name: Vera
Desc: Congratulations. You have started to talk nonsense like the mechanoids.

Name: Vera
Desc: Are you looking for my advice, Commandant? Just go with this.

Name: Vera
Desc: Did you just hold me accountable for all this, Commandant? Are you prepared to pay a price for it once we finish?

Name: Vera
Desc: Is there a problem, Commandant? Hang in there. I'm calling the Star of Life right away.

Name: Vera
Desc: Now isn't the time to play around, Commandant. Focus on the mission.

Name: Vera
Desc: The School Master is up to something. Reduce its level!

Name: Vera
Desc: Let's reduce the Master's level together.

Name: Vera
Desc: You go to the workshop to get more paint. What about me? I'll keep myself entertained.

Name: Vera
Desc: Hurry, go collect more Paint!

Name: Vera
Desc: Increase the research level

Name: Vera
Desc: Increase the research level

Name: Vera
Desc: Commandant... Commandant? Why are you zoning out? Go suppress the Schools, so the Masters can settle down a little.

Name: Vera
Desc: Still unsure about what to do, Commandant? Just reduce the influence of the Schools so they can calm down.

Name: Vera
Desc: Art Exhibition improves your understanding of Schools and therefore will increase your level. Isn't that simple?

Name: Vera
Desc: Art Exhibition sounds like a good idea. It can increase your School Level and help me to locate those guys.

Name: Vera
Desc: Feeling bored, Commandant? Why don't you just go find some paint in the workshop? You like it, don't you?

Name: Vera
Desc: Stop hesitating. Just find a workshop, break in and take the paint away. How difficult can that be?

Name: Lee
Desc: The basic works are all done.

Name: Lee
Desc: Your understanding of the machine art has further improved, Commandant.

Name: Lee
Desc: Decent progress, Commandant.

Name: Lee
Desc: Analysis completed. The components used in this paint are similar to the one used by the WGAA of Babylonia.

Name: Lee
Desc: This is the city's paint production system... It's surprisingly complete.

Name: Lee
Desc: The program is functioning normally. Automatically generating reviews.

Name: Lee
Desc: Do you need some advices, Commandant? Bear with me for one moment. I'll get you a report right away.

Name: Lee
Desc: Here are the cases that you can refer to.

Name: Lee
Desc: What's the matter, Commandant?

Name: Lee
Desc: Is anything bothering you, Commandant? How about a little break first?

Name: Lee
Desc: Boss is too powerful. Heal immediately.

Name: Lee
Desc: Boss is too powerful. Heal immediately.

Name: Lee
Desc: Go to an Energy Point to obtain data

Name: Lee
Desc: Go to an Energy Point to obtain data

Name: Lee
Desc: Increase the research level

Name: Lee
Desc: Increase the research level

Name: Lee
Desc: All we have to do is to reduce the influence of the Schools in the city to weaken the School Masters' impact.

Name: Lee
Desc: The most effective measure against this crisis is to reduce the influence of the Schools in the city and hence weaken the School Masters' impact.

Name: Lee
Desc: Make Art Exhibition to increase your understanding of the Schools and solve the problem.

Name: Lee
Desc: The Art Exhibition can effectively improve our understanding of the Schools.

Name: Lee
Desc: Without enough paint, we cannot execute any plan.

Name: Lee
Desc: Paint is our most needed basic resource right now.

Name: Ayla
Desc: Want to guess my win rate so far, Commandant? Hehe, 100%!

Name: Ayla
Desc: Look, Commandant, there's a painting of Ayla on that wall! My influence is spreading fast.

Name: Ayla
Desc: Can you hear them cheering for my work, Commandant?

Name: Ayla
Desc: This paint is exactly what we use in WGAA... Great! That means I can use it immediately in the "battlefield."

Name: Ayla
Desc: Great! As long as I have enough Paint, I can keep fighting.

Name: Ayla
Desc: A little bit of this and a little bit of that... Alright, review complete. Is there anything you would like to add, Commandant?

Name: Ayla
Desc: Commandant, this is a strategic secret, so you need to move closer. I don't want anyone else to hear it.

Name: Ayla
Desc: I didn't expect you to ask me about the strategies, Commandant... Is that a test? Can I ask for a reward if I get it right?

Name: Ayla
Desc: Commandant? Wait a sec, don't move! I want to draw your zoning out face.

Name: Ayla
Desc: Are you bored, Commandant? Can I use you as a model? 3, 2, 1, stop! Don't move, just keep staring at the terminal.

Name: Ayla
Desc: Boss is too powerful. Heal immediately.

Name: Ayla
Desc: Boss is too powerful. Heal immediately.

Name: Ayla
Desc: Go to an Energy Point to obtain data

Name: Ayla
Desc: Go to an Energy Point to obtain data

Name: Ayla
Desc: Increase the research level

Name: Ayla
Desc: Increase the research level

Name: Ayla
Desc: The essence of the School of Ayla is to defeat our opponents in the most direct and dignified manner... Then make all their influence ours!

Name: Ayla
Desc: It's getting noisy over there again, Commandant... What shall we do? To join them, of course!

Name: Ayla
Desc: Help me pick a painting for Art Exhibition, Commandant. I think the one you pick will increase Ayla's School Level even further.

Name: Ayla
Desc: Commandant, could you please wear an outfit I designed at the entrance of our Art Exhibition?

Name: Ayla
Desc: Would you like to go to the workshop, Commandant? It's too boring if I go by myself. Just come help me watch my back!

Name: Ayla
Desc: Smells like... Paint. Commandant, let's check out the workshop. Time to replenish our inventory.

Name: Karenina
Desc: I think I understood this work now... Don't laugh, Commandant! I really do.

Name: Karenina
Desc: Explosives? Where are my explosives? Oh, Commandant... I was about to tell you that our School Level just increased. Yeah, that was all!

Name: Karenina
Desc: I once heard an artist crushed his own work right before the exhibition. Will I surpass him if I blow all my works up?

Name: Karenina
Desc: Let me check the components of the paint... Geez, they will make perfect explosives!

Name: Karenina
Desc: Have you made all the paint into explosives? Good. Now is the time to create some "art."

Name: Karenina
Desc: Commandant, criticism can be made in many ways, so why don't we just do something straight forward like... Um, blowing it up? Can I?

Name: Karenina
Desc: Aren't you supposed to be thinking about these, Commandant? Fine, I'll only help you once.

Name: Karenina
Desc: Don't you try to slack off, Commandant! What do you mean by "You are the person I trust the most"...? Alright, this is the last time I'm doing this for you.

Name: Karenina
Desc: Now isn't the time to hesitate, Commandant. Let's finish the mission and go back to the camp together.

Name: Karenina
Desc: Zoning out again, Commandant? Or are you actually thinking about something? Teddy didn't tell you anything she shouldn't, did she?

Name: Karenina
Desc: Boss is too powerful. Heal immediately.

Name: Karenina
Desc: Boss is too powerful. Heal immediately.

Name: Karenina
Desc: Go to an Energy Point to obtain data

Name: Karenina
Desc: Go to an Energy Point to obtain data

Name: Karenina
Desc: Increase the research level

Name: Karenina
Desc: Increase the research level

Name: Karenina
Desc: If you don't know what to do, let's just reduce the Schools' influence in our way. Take this detonator, Commandant.

Name: Karenina
Desc: To make our life easier later, the priority is to reduce the Schools' influence to weaken their Masters.

Name: Karenina
Desc: What's next? Art Exhibition? I still have a lot of explosives here... What do you mean by "not that way"? Shall I use my Blast Hammer then?

Name: Karenina
Desc: Commandant, if you don't know what to do next, it's about time for Art Exhibition.

Name: Karenina
Desc: Don't you have other things to do other than staring at me? See, we are running out of paint.

Name: Karenina
Desc: Commandant? Do we still have enough paint? Shall we visit the workshop?
